mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID, NAME, USERNAME, PASSWORD, PHONE_NUMBER, ROLE) VALUES (USER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone_number}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NAME, USERNAME, PASSWORD, PHONE_NUMBER, ROLE, CASE WHEN STATUS = 0 THEN 'ACTIVE' WHEN STATUS = 1 THEN 'INACTIVE' WHEN STATUS = 2 THEN 'BLACK' END as userStatus FROM USERS WHERE USERNAME = #{username}

SELECT username, created_at as createdAt, status FROM users WHERE role NOT LIKE 'admin'
AND (LOWER(username) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%')
OFFSET #{pageable.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageable.pageSize} ROWS ONLY
